title: 1999년 State v. Timothy Wayne Tipton 사건
summary: 미국 Tennessee, TN 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: State v. Timothy Wayne Tipton. 판결일: 1999-08-12. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Tennessee.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: STATE of Tennessee, Appellee, v. Timothy W. TIPTON, Appellant
**판결일**: 1999-08-12
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Tennessee
**관할**: Tennessee, TN

**판사**: Glenn, Williams, Witt

## 변호인

Mark E. Stephens, District Public Defender, Paula R. Voss, Assistant District Public Defender, Knoxville, James R. Owen, Assistant District Public Defender, Knoxville, for Appellant., Paul G. Summers, Attorney General and Reporter, R. Stephen Jobe, Assistant Attorney General, Nashville, Randall E. Nichols, District Attorney General, Knoxville, Willie R. Harper, Assistant District Attorney General, Knoxville, for Appellee.

## 인용

- 13 S.W.3d 397
